item.title: Sony Ericsson's first Android phone
item.description: Sony Ericsson delivered a blow to Microsoft on Tuesday when it unveiled its latest Xperia handset, which unlike its Windows-powered predecessors is based on Google’s Android operating system.

item.title: Sony Ericsson does chunky retro Walkman W902
item.description: Ive had a look at the Sony Ericsson new Walkman W902 with retro chunky buttons much like a those on a casette walkman.
